data.message:
I'm doing great — thanks! Nice work building a web front end around me. Congratulations.

How would you like to proceed? I can help with any of the following (or something else you have in mind):

- Quick functionality test (send/receive messages, streaming)
- Debugging integration issues (auth, CORS, websockets)
- Designing front-end UX (message threading, typing indicators, error handling)
- Session & context management (history length, prompt trimming)
- Security & rate-limiting advice (sanitize inputs, limit requests, auth tokens)
- Example code snippets for client/server usage
- Creating system prompts, personas, or conversation flows

Tell me what you want to try first or share a link/snippet/errors and I’ll jump in.

content.text: Hi Cody. how are you today? I just built a nice web front end around you so we can chat

I'm doing great — thanks! Nice work building a web front end around me. Congratulations.

How would you like to proceed? I can help with any of the following (or something else you have in mind):

- Quick functionality test (send/receive messages, streaming)
- Debugging integration issues (auth, CORS, websockets)
- Designing front-end UX (message threading, typing indicators, error handling)
- Session & context management (history length, prompt trimming)
- Security & rate-limiting advice (sanitize inputs, limit requests, auth tokens)
- Example code snippets for client/server usage
- Creating system prompts, personas, or conversation flows

Tell me what you want to try first or share a link/snippet/errors and I’ll jump in.
